text: Maurice Fauré (born 26 June 1859, date of death unknown) was a French sports shooter. He competed at the 1906 Intercalated Games and the 1912 Summer Olympics. He won a bronze medal at the 1906 Intercalated Games. He was also awarded a retrospective silver medal in live pigeon shooting at the 1900 Summer Olympics, although the Olympic status of the event is disputed. ==References== Category:1859 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of France Category:Shooters at the 1906 Intercalated Games Category:Shooters at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:People from Chaville Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in shooting Category:Medalists at the 1906 Intercalated Games Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-Seine Category:Shooters at the 1900 Summer Olympics
title: Maurice Fauré
